column1: MATERIALS AND METHODS: Urine from 81 patients with RDEB ( 39 patients), junctional epidermolysis bullosa ( JEB; 12 patients), and epidermolysis bullosa simplex ( EBS; 30 patients), as well as unaffected family members of RDEB patients ( 33 patients), was tested for the presence of basic fibroblast growth factor ( bFGF) using a sensitive radioimmunoassay.
